name: Cute Cubes Massacre
description:
[Ludum Dare 33 Game]

Cute Cubes Massacre

Prevent the Cute Cubes from escaping from your laboratory where you perform horrible experiments and tests on those lovely and peaceful creatures.

Simple Tower Defense Game with three towers and three Cute Cube types. Survive as many waves as possible and reach a new highscore.

Ludum Dare Link:
